Texts.Eng:
Wonderful fish-men.

  ^orange;Diet^reset;: Omnivore, can eat raw meat.

^orange;Perks^reset;:
  ^cyan;Swim Boost 2^reset;
  Health and Energy x^green;1.15^reset;
  Damage x^green;1.05^reset;
  ^green;Resist^reset;: +^green;40^reset;% Fire, +^green;20^reset;% Ice
  ^cyan;Immune^reset;: Mud, Wet, Oxygen

^orange;Environment^reset;:
  Ocean biomes: +^green;20^reset;% Physical Resistance and Energy x^green;1.1^reset;
  Water/Waste Water/Swamp Water: ^cyan;Minor Regeneration^reset;, -^green;35^reset;% Hunger Drain

^orange;Weapons^reset;:
  Dual Fist: +^green;3^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;5^reset;% Speed
  Spear: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance, Damage x^green;1.1^reset;
  Shortspear: +^green;2^reset;% Crit Chance, +^green;5^reset;% Physical Resistance

^red;Weaknesses^reset;:
  ^red;Resist^reset;: -^red;40^reset;% Electric, -^red;15^reset;% Shadow and Cosmic
